title: BACKYARD BUNKER PART 3 - Digging The Biggest Hole
description: FINALLY - we see my backyard bunker fly through the air and INTO the ground. If you want robots to keep your floor clean - check out the Narwal Freo HERE:  (AMZ - Up to $700 price off) or  (Web - Up to $700 price off).   Its been a dream of mine to have a backyard bunker full of tech. I'm making this back yard bunker from two pieces of storm water run off pipe. 12ft wide culvert pipe that ends up being 40ft long. The Backyard Bunker project will sleep 6 people and will allow the group to stay underground for weeks!   Get your EXCLUSIVE JAR OF DIRT HERE:   Follow me for updates!  Instagram:   Facebook:   Twitter:    #NarwalFreo
